name: Hexlide
description: A minimalist, relaxing puzzle game with beautiful music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2GHz, 1 core Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: integrated Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz, 2 cores Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 300 MB available space
